document.full_text: the first-year assistant kevin ollie, who played for jim calhoun from 1991-95, has been a quiet voice of reassurance for a young huskies team.
document.title: 2011 n.c.a.a. tournament | sports of the times: at calhoun's side, exemplifying and reinforcing his message
lines_and_colors: the first-year assistant kevin ollie, who played for jim calhoun from 1991-95, has been a quiet voice of reassurance for a young huskies team.
